```{python}
import inspect_viz as vz
penguins = vz.Data("penguins.parquet")

param_x = vz.Param("body_mass")
param_y = vz.Param("flipper_length")
```


```{python}
axes = ["body_mass", "flipper_length", "bill_depth", "bill_length"]

vz.vconcat(
    vz.hconcat(
        vz.select("Y", param=param_y, options=axes),
        vz.select("X", param=param_x, options=axes),
    ),
    vz.vspace(10),
    vz.plot(
        vz.dot(penguins, x=param_x, y=param_y, stroke="species", symbol="species"),
        grid=True,
        x_label="Body mass (g) →",
        y_label="↑ Flipper length (mm)",
        legend="symbol",
    )
)
```

```{python}
vz.plot(
    vz.dot(penguins, x=param_x, y=param_y, fill="species", symbol="species"),
    grid=True,
    x_label="Body mass (g) →",
    y_label="↑ Flipper length (mm)",
    legend="symbol",
)
```

```{python}
from inspect_viz._core._widget import Widget
from inspect_viz.mosaic import HConcat, VConcat, VSpace, Plot, Menu, Column, Dot, Legend

spec = VConcat(
    vconcat=[
        HConcat(
            hconcat=[
                Menu(
                    label="Y",
                    options=[
                        "body_mass",
                        "flipper_length",
                        "bill_depth",
                        "bill_length",
                    ],
                    as_=param_y,
                ),
                Menu(
                    label="X",
                    options=[
                        "body_mass",
                        "flipper_length",
                        "bill_depth",
                        "bill_length",
                    ],
                    as_=param_x,
                ),
            ]
        ),
        VSpace(vspace=10),
        HConcat(
            hconcat=[
                Plot(
                    name="stroked",
                    plot=[
                        Dot(
                            data=penguins.plot_from(),
                            x=Column(column=param_x),
                            y=Column(column=param_y),
                            stroke = 'species',
                            symbol = 'species',
                        )
                    ],
                    grid=True,
                    xLabel="Body mass (g) →",
                    yLabel="↑ Flipper length (mm)",
                ),
                Legend(legend="symbol", for_="stroked", columns=1),
            ]
        ),
    ]
)

Widget(component=spec)
```
